casebody.data:
In re WACHOVIA SHAREHOLDERS LITIGATION
appealed by Wachovia Shareholder. No. 106P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2005. G. Gray Wilson, Linda L. Helms, Winston-Salem, Stephen T. Rodd, New York, NY, Russell M. Robinson, Martin L. Brackett, Jr., Robert W. Fuller, Katherine Gordon Maynard, William K. Davis, Charlotte, James T. Williams, Jr., Greensboro, Francis C. Clark, Deputy General Counsel, for Wachovia Corporation.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 22nd day of February 2005 by Plaintiffs (Wachovia Shareholders) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of April 2005."
